## 1. **Import Data**

First, we will import the dataset.

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# Import the data
data <- readxl::read_excel("../ZDatasets/Data_Total_Movement_AU.xlsx", col_names = FALSE, sheet = 2, skip = 10)

# Get the columns
first_row <- readxl::read_excel("../ZDatasets/Data_Total_Movement_AU.xlsx", col_names = FALSE, sheet = 2, n_max =1)
colnames(data) <- c("Year",first_row)
head(data)
```
